means: 收集( collect的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The passengers went through immigration control and collected their baggage.
sentence.Network_cn: 旅客通过入境检查后领取了自己的行李。

sentence.Network_en: Dishonest importers would be able to pocket the VAT collected from customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 不诚实的进口商将会能够把从顾客那里收取的增值税据为己有。

sentence.Network_en: She had just collected her pension from the post office.
sentence.Network_cn: 她刚去邮局取了养老金。

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... deluge v 大洪水；暴雨 collect v 收集，集中 collection n 集合；收藏.

entry.def: An author's collected works or letters are all their works or letters published in one book or in a set of books.

example.tran: 拉迪亚德·吉卜林作品全集

example.ex: His collected poems have just been published.

entry.tran: (尤指在困难或危急情境中)镇定的，泰然自若的
entry.def: If you say that someone is collected, you mean that they are very calm and self-controlled, especially when they are in a difficult or serious situation.

example.ex: Police say she was cool and collected during her interrogation.
example.tran: 警方说她在审问过程中表现得冷静自若。

means.word_mean: 2. brought together into a group or crowd;
3. in full control of your faculties;

sentences.sentence: "the witness remained collected throughout the cross-examination"
"more self-contained and more dependable than many of the early frontiersmen"
"strong and self-possessed in the face of trouble"

auth_sentence.content: He is alleged to have collected cocaine from Sandiford.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is alleged to have collected cocaine from Sandiford.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is alleged to have collected cocaine from Sandiford.

auth_sentence.content: How does Not Panicking Ltd use the information collected?
auth_sentence.res_content: How does Not Panicking Ltd use the information collected?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How does Not Panicking Ltd use the information collected?

auth_sentence.content: Little of that money is collected in lump-sum payments.
auth_sentence.res_content: Little of that money is collected in lump-sum payments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Little of that money is collected in lump-sum payments.

Sentence.sentence: Today, any data that is collected about us in one place or another — and for one reason or another — can be stored in a computer bank.
Its conclusions are based on carefully collected data.
Within samples collected from the solid substances lying beneath the ice

means.word_mean: 收集成的；(作品等)成集的

sentences.en: All the evidence collected so far points to robbery as the motive of the crime.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止所搜集的全部证据说明,这一犯罪行为的动机是抢劫。

sentences.en: The two volumes of collected Irish Stories are printed.
sentences.cn: 两卷本的《爱尔兰故事集》已经印好了。

sentences.en: He did his best to appear cool, calm and collected.
sentences.cn: 他尽力使自己显得镇定自若。

sentences.en: The witness was remarkably collected under cross-examination.
sentences.cn: 在连番询问之下,证人仍然镇定自若。
